verse.body: There is one body and one Spirit, just as you were called to one hope when you were called

header.story: A story about falling in and out of love.

introtext.1: God has blessed us with love and friendship.
introtext.2: We, Young Rak Choi and Sinai Park have chosen to begin our new life together.
introtext.3: We admit the need to celebrate and share the joy, but we agreed to have a simple and small wedding with the blessings of both families.
introtext.4: We joyously invite you to witness as we exchange marriage vows and celebrate with us.
introtext.5: Each of us alone is incomplete, together with Christ we are as one in this there shall be joy.

dday2: days left until Young ♥︎ Sinai wedding

story.t3: dang, i think we get along pretty well
